title: getting error message in ranked selection
body:
got the following error message then lagged out and couldn't select champ. It counted toward a loss in my promo :( between that and the troll picks in queue I fear I will never be able to move up :(
is that a server or client problem ?

Unknown error

an unknown error has occured

sorry about that. we sent a report to the server.

if you continue encountering this error you may want to check the the support site or forum for more information

replies.body: I am getting this too for the past 2 hours.
same thing happened to me bump
